analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas shes pa gang gis 'dus ma byas kyi khams shes pa yongs su shes /
translated: Householder, here the Tathāgata, with a knowledge that fully understands the unconditioned element,

original: @104b khong du chud /
analyzed: @104b khong du chud /
translated: fully understands,

original: mngon sum du byas pa'i lam shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i lam shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: knows as it really is the knowledge of the path that leads to cessation.

original: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If one abides observing the absence of enjoyment,

original: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: if one abides observing the disadvantages,

original: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'o //
translated: if one abides observing the escape.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i par dag tu lan gsung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i par dag tu lan gsung ste /
translated: When asked about the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the unconditioned realm of the Tathagata, he answers for an eon, up to inexpressibly inexpressible eons.

original: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
analyzed: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
translated: His eloquence is inexhaustible.

original: khyim bdag / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Householder, why is that?

original: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings bla na med pa mkhyen rab kyis shin tu thugs su chud de /
analyzed: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings bla na med pa mkhyen rab kyis shin tu thugs su chud de /
translated: Because the Tathagata has fully understood the unsurpassed realm of phenomena with wisdom.

original: gang thugs su chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang bzhu ba zhus pa'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
analyzed: gang thugs su chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang bzhu ba zhus pa'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
translated: The eloquence of the Tathagata's knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the unconditioned realm, which he has fully understood, is inexhaustible.

original: de lta bas na /
analyzed: de lta bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: 'dir gang gis ye shes mthong ba thogs pa med par 'jug pa de ni /
analyzed: 'dir gang gis ye shes mthong ba thogs pa med par 'jug pa de ni /
translated: here, whoever enters the unobstructed vision of wisdom

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: will enjoy this from the sandalwood courtyard up to the mansion.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, how is it that you are not afraid of the lower realms?🔽🔽

original: de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who is thus gone, know the world well, just as it is?

original: nyi ma dang zla ba yongs su rgyu bas phyogs gsal zhing @105a *//
analyzed: nyi ma dang zla ba yongs su rgyu bas phyogs gsal zhing @105a *//
translated: “Householder, the world is illuminated by the light of the sun and moon,

original: snang bar byed pa'i zla ba stong dang / nyi ma stong dang / dzambu'i gling stong dang / gling chen po dang / shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod stong dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris stong dang /
analyzed: snang bar byed pa'i zla ba stong dang / nyi ma stong dang / dzambu'i gling stong dang / gling chen po dang / shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod stong dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris stong dang /
translated: by the light of a thousand moons and a thousand suns, by the light of a thousand Jambudvīpas, by the light of a thousand Pūrvavidehas, by the light of a thousand Avaragodānīyas, by the light of a thousand Uttarakurus, by the light of a thousand worlds of the Four Great Kings,

original: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas stong dang / 'thab bral gyi gnas stong dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas stong dang / 'phrul dga'i gnas stong dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang phyed kyi gnas stong dang / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong ji snyed pa 'di ni /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas stong dang / 'thab bral gyi gnas stong dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas stong dang / 'phrul dga'i gnas stong dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang phyed kyi gnas stong dang / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong ji snyed pa 'di ni /
translated: by the light of a thousand worlds of the Thirty-Three Gods, by the light of a thousand worlds of Yāma, by the light of a thousand worlds of Tuṣita, by the light of a thousand worlds of Nirmāṇarati, by the light of a thousand worlds of Paranirmitavaśavartin, and by the light of a thousand worlds of Brahmā.

original: stong spyi phud dang / chung du dang / tha ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ste /
analyzed: stong spyi phud dang / chung du dang / tha ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ste /
translated: The term “world system” is used to refer to the smallest, the middling, and the greatest world systems.

original: tshul de lta bu'i spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: tshul de lta bu'i spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: A thousand of these smallest world systems is called

original: stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o //🔽tshul de lta bu'i stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o // tshul de lta bu'i stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: a “second order world system of one thousand worlds.”🔽A thousand of these second order world systems is called

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ste /🔽'dra bar 'jig /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ste / 'dra bar 'jig /
translated: a “third order great universal system of one billion worlds.”

original: 'dra bar chags /🔽'dra bar zhig nas gnas /
analyzed: 'dra bar chags / 'dra bar zhig nas gnas /
translated: They are destroyed and formed in the same way.🔽They are destroyed and formed in the same way.🔽They remain destroyed in the same way.

original: 'dra bar chags nas gnas so //🔽tshul de lta bu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag ni /🔽'jig / gzhan dag ni /🔽chags / gzhan dag zhig nas gnas /
analyzed: 'dra bar chags nas gnas so // tshul de lta bu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag ni / 'jig / gzhan dag ni / chags / gzhan dag zhig nas gnas /
translated: They are formed in the same way.🔽In this way, in the east, some of these third order world systems are in the process of being destroyed, some are in the process of being formed, some remain destroyed, and some remain formed.

original: @105b gzhan dag chags nas gnas te /
analyzed: @105b gzhan dag chags nas gnas te /
translated: In the same way, in the south, in the west, and in the north, some of these third order world systems are in the process of being destroyed, some are in the process of being formed, some remain destroyed, and some remain formed.

original: lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / byang shar dang / 'og dang / steng gi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa gzhan dag ni /
analyzed: lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / byang shar dang / 'og dang / steng gi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa gzhan dag ni /
translated: the southern direction, the western direction, the northern direction, the southeastern direction, the southwestern direction, the northwestern direction, the northeastern direction, the nadir, and the zenith.

original: 'jig / gzhan dag ni /🔽chags / gzhan dag zhig nas gnas /
analyzed: 'jig / gzhan dag ni / chags / gzhan dag zhig nas gnas /
translated: Some other world systems are destroyed,🔽some other world systems are in the process of being destroyed,🔽some other world systems have been destroyed and are in the process of remaining that way,

original: gzhan dag chags nas gnas so //
analyzed: gzhan dag chags nas gnas so //
translated: and some other world systems are in the process of being created.

original: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: The knowledge, seeing, clarity, realization, thorough understanding, and expertise regarding this

original: 'jig rten shes pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten shes pa zhes bya ste /
translated: is called “knowledge of the world.”

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata has perfect knowledge of this as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If one were to ask the Tathāgata about this knowledge of the world, he could answer for an eon or more than an eon,

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and the mansion.🔽Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who is the knower of the world,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: know as it really is the knowledge of the arising of the world?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata has understood this thus:

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge pa'i rtsa ba bskyed nas 'jig rten shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de @106a *//🔽bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge pa'i rtsa ba bskyed nas 'jig rten shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de @106a *// bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Having planted roots of virtue with immeasurable Buddha Bhagavāns, the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the world is accomplished.🔽The Tathāgata knows this as it really is.

original: khyim bdag / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Moreover, the Tathāgata has understood this thus:

original: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: He knows perfectly the causes and conditions by which the knowledge of the arising of the world is accomplished.

original: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa nas gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa nas gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: If one dwells contemplating impermanence, and so on, up to if one dwells contemplating the adversary, he knows perfectly.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te; de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te; de ni /
translated: If one asks the Tathāgata about this knowledge of the arising of the world, he would answer for an eon or longer than an eon.

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood palace.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathāgata know as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the world?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows this thus:

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
translated: He has acted for the welfare of countless sentient beings, turning them away from what is harmful.

original: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde @106b ba la btsud pa ni /
analyzed: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde @106b ba la btsud pa ni /
translated: He has illuminated the world and dispelled the darkness, liberating countless sentient beings from suffering and bringing them to happiness.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams shes pa 'gog pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams shes pa 'gog pa ste /
translated: This is the cessation of the knowledge of the world-system.

original: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
translated: It is unborn from the very beginning.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata knows this as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If someone were to ask the Tathāgata about this knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the world-system, he would answer for an eon, or even longer than an eon.

original: de ni; tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni; tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, how is it that

original: de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “How does the Tathāgata know as it really is the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of knowledge of the world?”🔽“Householder, here the Tathāgata knows as it really is the knowledge by which the knowledge of the world is known,

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te; shes pa gang gis 'jig rten shes pa yongs su shes /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te; shes pa gang gis 'jig rten shes pa yongs su shes /
translated: understood,

original: khong du chud /🔽mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te; gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: khong du chud / mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te; gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: and actualized.🔽If one abides observing the absence of enjoyment,

original: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: if one abides observing the disadvantages,

original: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: or if one abides observing the escape, the Tathāgata knows that as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes @107a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes @107a *//
translated: The Tathāgata knows as it really is the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of knowledge of the world.

original: pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: When asked, he would answer for an eon, or even longer than an eon.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and this fine house.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathāgata know the various aspirations of beings as they truly are?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽sems can 'di dag ni /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / sems can 'di dag ni /
translated: Householder, here the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: gzugs la mos so //🔽sems can 'di dag ni /
analyzed: gzugs la mos so // sems can 'di dag ni /
translated: “These beings have the aspiration for form.

original: sgra la mos so //🔽sems can 'di dag ni /
analyzed: sgra la mos so // sems can 'di dag ni /
translated: These beings have the aspiration for sound.

original: dri la mos so //🔽sems can 'di dag ni /
analyzed: dri la mos so // sems can 'di dag ni /
translated: These beings have the aspiration for smell.

original: ro la mos so //🔽sems can 'di dag ni /
analyzed: ro la mos so // sems can 'di dag ni /
translated: These beings have the aspiration for taste.🔽These beings have the aspiration for touch.

original: reg bya la mos so //🔽zhes khyim bdag /
analyzed: reg bya la mos so // zhes khyim bdag /
translated: These beings have the aspiration for phenomena.

original: de ltar na; de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de ltar na; de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Householder, thus the Tathāgata knows the various aspirations of beings as they truly are.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa du ma shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa du ma shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
translated: When he was asked about the origin of the Tathāgata’s knowledge of many kinds of faith, he answered for an eon.

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, you will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathāgata know the origin of the knowledge of many kinds of faith as it really is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata has understood this thus:

original: @107b sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas mos pa du ma shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: @107b sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas mos pa du ma shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Having planted wholesome roots with immeasurable lord buddhas, the knowledge of the origin of the knowledge of many kinds of faith is accomplished. The Tathāgata knows this as it really is.

original: khyim bdag / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Moreover, householder, the Tathāgata has understood this thus:

original: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis mos ba du ma shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis mos ba du ma shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: He knows perfectly the causes and conditions by which the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the many kinds of faith is accomplished.

original: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If he abides in the contemplation of impermanence,

original: gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: up to if he abides in the contemplation of the adversary, the Tathāgata knows it perfectly as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa du ma shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung nas de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa du ma shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung nas de ni /
translated: If he were to explain the answers to the questions about that knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the many kinds of faith of the Tathāgata, he would speak for an eon

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: and he would enjoy this sandalwood palace and courtyard.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who is the knower of the world, the knower of the realm of phenomena, the perfect complete Buddha, know the cessation of the knowledge of the many kinds of faith?🔽“

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows this:

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
translated: He has acted for the welfare of countless sentient beings and turned them away from what is not welfare.

original: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal @108a *//
analyzed: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal @108a *//
translated: He has created light and dispelled darkness.

original: te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
analyzed: te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
translated: He has liberated countless sentient beings from suffering and established them in happiness.

original: mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog pa ste /
analyzed: mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog pa ste /
translated: This is the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the various inclinations.

original: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
translated: It is also a quality that has not arisen from the beginning.

original: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: The knowledge, seeing, clarity, realization, thorough understanding, and expertise that is in regard to that

original: mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya ste /
translated: is called the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the various inclinations.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata thoroughly knows this:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
translated: When asked about the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of many aspirations, he would answer for an eon, or even longer than an eon.

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na / de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, you will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.🔽Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who is the knower of the world, the knower of the realm of beings, the knower of the disposition of beings, and the teacher who is the unsurpassed leader of persons to be tamed,

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas shes pa gang gis mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yongs su shes /🔽khong du chud /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas shes pa gang gis mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yongs su shes / khong du chud /
translated: know the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of many aspirations?🔽Householder, in this regard, the Tathāgata, through a certain knowledge, knows the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of many aspirations.

original: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes la de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /🔽gal te ro myang ba med par @108b rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes la de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te / gal te ro myang ba med par @108b rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: He fully understands it,🔽realizes it, and actualizes it.🔽If he abides in the observation of the absence of enjoyment,

original: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas ba'am /
analyzed: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas ba'am /
translated: or if he abides in the observation of the disadvantages,

original: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata has perfect knowledge of the way things are with regard to the way of abiding that is directed toward renunciation.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung pa nas de ni /🔽tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung pa nas de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: “The Tathāgata, the Worthy One, the Perfectly Enlightened One, knowing the cessation of the knowledge of the termination of the outflows, when asked about it, would give an answer that would take one eon to give, and then he would not finish.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata, the Worthy One, the Perfectly Enlightened One, with his knowledge of the termination of the outflows, know and see the termination of the outflows?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, here the Tathāgata has the following knowledge of the termination of the outflows:

original: sems can 'di dag ni /
analyzed: sems can 'di dag ni /
translated: ‘These sentient beings have the termination of the outflows without further grasping.

original: sngon po la mos so; ;sems can 'di dag ni /🔽ser po la mos so //
analyzed: sngon po la mos so; ;sems can 'di dag ni / ser po la mos so //
translated: These sentient beings have the termination of the outflows with further grasping.

analyzed: sems can 'di dag ni / dmar po la mos so //

analyzed: sems can 'di dang ni /🔽dkar po la mos so //

original: sems can 'di dag ni /
analyzed: sems can 'di dag ni /
translated: These sentient beings

original: sna tshogs la mos so //
analyzed: sna tshogs la mos so //
translated: have various aspirations.

original: zhes khyim bdag /
analyzed: zhes khyim bdag /
translated: Householder,

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: thus

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa yang dag pa ji ltar ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa yang dag pa ji ltar ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: the Tathāgata knows as it really is the various aspirations.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa sna tshogs shes pa de la'ang zhu pa zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /🔽de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi @109a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa sna tshogs shes pa de la'ang zhu pa zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te / de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi @109a *//
translated: And if the Tathāgata were to explain the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the various aspirations in detail, he would speak for an eon or more than an eon, and still he would not reach the end.🔽He would enjoy this place,

original: bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: the sandalwood courtyard and the fine mansion.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: how does the Tathāgata know as it really is the arising of the knowledge of the various aspirations?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, here the Tathāgata has this kind of knowledge:

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Having planted the roots of virtue with immeasurable Buddha Bhagavans, the Tathāgata has perfectly realized the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of various inclinations.

original: khyim bdag / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata knows in this way:

original: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis mos pa sna tshogs shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis mos pa sna tshogs shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: He knows perfectly as it is the causes and conditions by which the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of various inclinations is perfectly accomplished.

original: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa nas gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa nas gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Whether one abides in the observation of impermanence, up to whether one abides in the observation of opposition, the Tathāgata knows that perfectly as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa sna tshogs shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /🔽@109b de ni; tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa sna tshogs shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te / @109b de ni; tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na / de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “Householder, when asked, ‘How does the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, know the cessation of the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of various aspirations?’ he would answer for an eon, and so on as before.🔽“Householder, when asked, ‘How does the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, know the cessation of the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of various aspirations?’ he would answer for an eon, and so on as before.🔽“Householder, when asked, ‘How does the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, know the cessation of the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of various aspirations?’ he would answer for an eon, and so on as before.

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /🔽snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la / snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
translated: “Householder, when asked, ‘How does the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, know the cessation of the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of various aspirations?’ he would answer for an eon, and so on as before.🔽“Householder, when asked, ‘How does the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, know the cessation of the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of various aspirations?’ he would answer for an eon, and so on as before.

original: mos pa sna tshogs shes pa 'gog pa ste /
analyzed: mos pa sna tshogs shes pa 'gog pa ste /
translated: “Householder, when asked, ‘How does the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, know the cessation of the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of various aspirations?’ he would answer for an eon, and so on as before.🔽“Householder, when asked, ‘How does the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, know the cessation of the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of various aspirations?’ he would answer for an eon, and so on as before.🔽“Householder, when asked, ‘How does the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, know the cessation of the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of various aspirations?’ he would answer for an eon, and so on as before.

original: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
translated: It is also unborn from the beginning.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata has fully and perfectly known it as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa sna tshogs shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa sna tshogs shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If you were to ask about the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of various inclinations, he would answer for an eon, or half an eon, or more.

original: bde ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: bde ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, you will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and this fine house.🔽Householder, how does the Tathāgata know the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of various inclinations?

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /🔽khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin @110a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na / khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin @110a *//
translated: Householder, in this regard the Tathāgata has fully and perfectly known the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of various inclinations as it really is.🔽Householder, the Tathāgata has fully and perfectly known the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of various inclinations as it really is.

original: gshegs pa shes pa gang gis mos pa sna tshogs shes pa yongs su shes /🔽khong du chud /
analyzed: gshegs pa shes pa gang gis mos pa sna tshogs shes pa yongs su shes / khong du chud /
translated: He has fully and perfectly known the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of various inclinations as it really is.

original: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: He has fully and perfectly known the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of various inclinations as it really is.

original: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If he abides in the contemplation of the enjoyment of the Dharma, the Tathāgata knows it just as it is.

original: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am; gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am; gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: If he abides in the contemplation of the faults of the Dharma, or if he abides in the contemplation of the escape from the Dharma, the Tathāgata knows it just as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa sna tshogs shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa sna tshogs shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: “To the Tathāgata, who has the knowledge of the cessation of the path of the knowledge of the various aspirings, when asked a question he would answer for an eon, and so on as before.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na / de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood terrace and this mansion.🔽“Householder, how does the Tathāgata know the faculties?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Here, the Tathāgata knows the eye faculty just as it is.

original: mig gi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /🔽mig gi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes /
analyzed: mig gi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes / mig gi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes /
translated: He knows the eye faculty, its arising, its cessation, and the path to its cessation.🔽He knows the ear faculty, its arising, its cessation, and the path to its cessation.

original: mig gi dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba @110b bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: mig gi dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba @110b bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: He knows the nose faculty, its arising, its cessation, and the path to its cessation.🔽He knows the tongue faculty, its arising, its cessation, and the path to its cessation.

original: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
translated: He knows the body faculty, its arising, its cessation, and the path to its cessation.🔽He knows the mind faculty, its arising, its cessation, and the path to its cessation.🔽He knows the female faculty, its arising, its cessation, and the path to its cessation.🔽He knows the male faculty, its arising, its cessation, and the path to its cessation.

original: yid kyi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes; yid kyi dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa dang / mo'i dbang po shes pa dang / pho'i dbang po shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / srog gi dbang po shes pa dang /
analyzed: yid kyi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes; yid kyi dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa dang / mo'i dbang po shes pa dang / pho'i dbang po shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / srog gi dbang po shes pa dang /
translated: He knows the life faculty, its arising, its cessation, and the path to its cessation.

original: bde ba'i dbang po shes pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po shes pa dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po shes pa dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po shes pa dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po shes pa dang / dad pa'i dbang po shes pa dang /
analyzed: bde ba'i dbang po shes pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po shes pa dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po shes pa dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po shes pa dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po shes pa dang / dad pa'i dbang po shes pa dang /
translated: It is the knowledge of the faculty of pleasure, the knowledge of the faculty of pain, the knowledge of the faculty of mental pleasure, the knowledge of the faculty of mental displeasure, the knowledge of the faculty of equanimity, the knowledge of the faculty of faith,

original: brtson 'grus kyi dbang po shes pa dang / dran pa'i dbang po shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po shes pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa dang / mi shes pa kun shes pa'i dbang po shes pa dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po shes pa dang /🔽kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi dbang po shes pa dang / dran pa'i dbang po shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po shes pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa dang / mi shes pa kun shes pa'i dbang po shes pa dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po shes pa dang / kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
translated: the knowledge of the faculty of perseverance, the knowledge of the faculty of mindfulness, the knowledge of the faculty of concentration, the knowledge of the faculty of wisdom, the knowledge of the faculty of understanding what has not been understood, the knowledge of the faculty of understanding,🔽and the knowledge of the faculty of causing understanding.🔽It is the knowledge of the origin of the faculty of causing understanding,

original: kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes /
analyzed: kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes /
translated: it is the knowledge of the cessation of the faculty of causing understanding,

original: kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa'i bar yang dag ba ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa'i bar yang dag ba ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: and it is the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the faculty of causing understanding.

original: thams cad la'ang rgyas par bya zhing mdo dang po ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: thams cad la'ang rgyas par bya zhing mdo dang po ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: and so on for all the faculties.

original: khyim bdag @111a *//
analyzed: khyim bdag @111a *//
translated: Householder,

original: ji ltar na /
analyzed: ji ltar na /
translated: how is it that

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: the Tathāgata knows the eye faculty in accordance with reality?

original: 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag gi dang ba ni /
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag gi dang ba ni /
translated: The clarity of the four great elements

original: mig gi dbang po yin te /
analyzed: mig gi dbang po yin te /
translated: is the eye faculty.

original: sa'i khams dang ba dang / chu'i khams dang ba dang / me'i khams dang ba dang / rlung gi khams dang ba yin te /🔽de la sa'i khams dang ba'ang tshig ma yin la /
analyzed: sa'i khams dang ba dang / chu'i khams dang ba dang / me'i khams dang ba dang / rlung gi khams dang ba yin te / de la sa'i khams dang ba'ang tshig ma yin la /
translated: The clarity of the earth element, the clarity of the water element, the clarity of the fire element, and the clarity of the wind element—🔽the clarity of the earth element is not the eye,

original: sa'i khams dang ba las gzhan pa'ang mig ma yin /
analyzed: sa'i khams dang ba las gzhan pa'ang mig ma yin /
translated: and neither is the eye something other than the clarity of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams dang ba'ang mig ma yin la /
analyzed: chu'i khams dang ba'ang mig ma yin la /
translated: The clarity of the water element is not the eye,

original: chu'i khams dang ba las gzhan pa'ang mig ma yin /
analyzed: chu'i khams dang ba las gzhan pa'ang mig ma yin /
translated: and neither is the eye something other than the clarity of the water element.

original: me'i khams dang ba'ang mig ma yin la /
analyzed: me'i khams dang ba'ang mig ma yin la /
translated: The clarity of the fire element is not the eye,

original: me'i khams dang ba las gzhan pa'ang mig ma yin /
analyzed: me'i khams dang ba las gzhan pa'ang mig ma yin /
translated: and neither is the eye something other than the clarity of the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams dang ba'ang mig ma yin /
analyzed: rlung gi khams dang ba'ang mig ma yin /
translated: The clarity of the wind element is not the eye,🔽and neither is the eye something other than the clarity of the wind element.

original: rlung gi khams dang ba las gzhan pa'ang mig ma yin mod kyi /
analyzed: rlung gi khams dang ba las gzhan pa'ang mig ma yin mod kyi /
translated: The element of wind is not the eye, but it is not other than the eye.

original: khyim bdag / 'on kyang las kyi rnam par smin pas mig yongs su grub pa yin te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'on kyang las kyi rnam par smin pas mig yongs su grub pa yin te /
translated: Householder, the eye is formed by the ripening of karma.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata fully knows it as it really is.

original: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba nas mkhas pa'i bar gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba nas mkhas pa'i bar gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: The knowledge and vision up to the expertise regarding that is

original: mig gi dbang po shes pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: mig gi dbang po shes pa zhes bya ste /
translated: called the knowledge of the eye faculty.🔽The Tathāgata fully knows it as it really is.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, having fully awakened to this world with its gods,🔽maruts, and Brahmā, to this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans,🔽teaches the Dharma by the turning of the wheel of Dharma.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi dbang po shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa @111b na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi dbang po shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa @111b na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Householder, how is it that the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, having fully awakened to this world with its gods,

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: maruts, and Brahmā, to this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans,

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: teaches the Dharma by the turning of the wheel of Dharma?

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: How does the Tathāgata know the knowledge of the arising of the eye faculty?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, in this regard the Tathāgata knows thus:🔽“Having planted the roots of virtue with immeasurable buddha bhagavāns, the knowledge of the arising of the eye faculty is accomplished.”

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas mig gi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas mig gi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata knows it just as it is.

original: khyim bdag / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, moreover, the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis mig gi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te; gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar ngas pa nas gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab🔽tu mkhyen to //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu pa na bskal bar lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis mig gi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te; gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar ngas pa nas gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to // de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu pa na bskal bar lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If it is the knowledge of impermanence, up to if it is the knowledge of the opponent, the Tathāgata knows it perfectly as it is.

original: de ni / tsandan @112a *//
analyzed: de ni / tsandan @112a *//
translated: When asked about the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the eye-faculty, he would answer for an eon, and so on as before.🔽He will enjoy this sandalwood

original: gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: courtyard and palace.”

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: “Householder, how

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “How does the Tathāgata know the cessation of the knowledge of the eye faculty as it really is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, here the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
translated: Having benefited immeasurable sentient beings and turned them away from what is not beneficial,

original: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
analyzed: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
translated: having illuminated what was dark and caused immeasurable sentient beings to be freed from suffering and to enter into happiness,

original: mig gi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa ste /
analyzed: mig gi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa ste /
translated: the cessation of the knowledge of the eye faculty

original: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
translated: is from the very beginning a dharma that is unborn.

original: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The knowledge, seeing, illumination, realization, full understanding, and expertise with regard to that, the Tathāgata knows precisely as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te; de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te; de ni /
translated: “Householder, when asked about the knowledge of the cessation of the eye faculty, the Tathāgata would explain it for an eon, or for even more than an eon.

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi dbang po @112b shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na / de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi dbang po @112b shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and the mansion.🔽Householder, how does the Tathāgata know as it really is the path that leads to the cessation of the eye faculty?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis mig gi dbang po shes pa yongs su shes /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis mig gi dbang po shes pa yongs su shes /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, with that knowledge, knows as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the eye faculty.

original: khong du chud /
analyzed: khong du chud /
translated: He knows it, understands it, and realizes it.

original: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /🔽gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te / gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: He knows as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the eye faculty.🔽If he abides observing the enjoyment of the eye faculty,

original: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: if he abides observing the danger in the eye faculty,

original: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: If he abides in the view of renunciation, the Tathāgata knows it just as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If he asks about the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the eye faculty, the Tathāgata would answer him for an eon, and so on as before.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and the mansion.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, how

original: de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: does the Tathāgata know the knowledge of the ear faculty just as it is?

original: 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ba ni /
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ba ni /
translated: The clarity of the four great elements

original: rna ba'i dbang po yin te /
analyzed: rna ba'i dbang po yin te /
translated: is the ear faculty.

original: sa'i khams dang ba dang / chu'i khams dang ba dang / me'i khams dang ba dang / rlung gi khams dang ba yin te /
analyzed: sa'i khams dang ba dang / chu'i khams dang ba dang / me'i khams dang ba dang / rlung gi khams dang ba yin te /
translated: It is the clarity of the earth element, the clarity of the water element, the clarity of the fire element, and the clarity of the wind element.

original: de la sa'i khams dang ba'ang rna ba'i dbang po ma yin la /🔽sa'i khams dang ba las gzhan pa'ang @113a *//🔽rna ba'i dbang po ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de la sa'i khams dang ba'ang rna ba'i dbang po ma yin la / sa'i khams dang ba las gzhan pa'ang @113a *// rna ba'i dbang po ma yin zhing /
translated: The purity of the earth element is not the ear sense faculty.🔽Nor is the ear sense faculty other than the purity of the earth element.🔽The purity of the water element is not the ear sense faculty.🔽Nor is the ear sense faculty other than the purity of the water element.

original: rlung gi khams dang ba las gzhan pa'ang rna ba'i dbang po ma yin mod kyi /
analyzed: rlung gi khams dang ba las gzhan pa'ang rna ba'i dbang po ma yin mod kyi /
translated: Nor is the ear sense faculty other than the purity of the wind element.

original: 'on kyang las kyi rnam par smin pas rna ba'i dbang po mngon par grub pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang las kyi rnam par smin pas rna ba'i dbang po mngon par grub pa yin no //
translated: However, the ear sense faculty is produced through the ripening of karma.

original: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba nam mkhas pa'i bar gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba nam mkhas pa'i bar gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: That which is the knowledge and seeing of the ear sense faculty,

original: rna ba'i dbang po shes pa zhes bya ste; de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: rna ba'i dbang po shes pa zhes bya ste; de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: is called the knowledge of the ear sense faculty. The Tathāgata has thoroughly known it just as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rna ba'i dbang po shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rna ba'i dbang po shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
translated: If one were to ask the Tathāgata about this knowledge of the ear sense faculty, he could answer for an eon or more.

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: sna dang / lce dang / lus kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: sna dang / lce dang / lus kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The nose, tongue, and body are also like this.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na / de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata, Worthy, Perfectly  Enlightened One know the mind faculty?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi dbang po ni /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi dbang po ni /
translated: “Householder, here the Tathāgata, Worthy, Perfectly Enlightened One knows the mind faculty as it really is:

original: dbang po lnga dag gi gtso bo yin no //
analyzed: dbang po lnga dag gi gtso bo yin no //
translated: ‘The mind faculty is the chief of the five faculties.’

original: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //🔽yid kyi dbang po ni /🔽dbang po lnga dag gi spyod yul la spyod pa dang / yid kyi dbang po ni /
analyzed: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to // yid kyi dbang po ni / dbang po lnga dag gi spyod yul la spyod pa dang / yid kyi dbang po ni /
translated: He knows the mind faculty as it really is:

original: dbang po lnga'i zhing yin no //
analyzed: dbang po lnga'i zhing yin no //
translated: ‘The mind faculty experiences the domain of the five faculties,’ and ‘The mind faculty is the field of the five faculties.’

original: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /🔽khyim bdag / de ltar na /
analyzed: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te / khyim bdag / de ltar na /
translated: He knows the mind faculty as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas @113b yid kyi dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas @113b yid kyi dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: “Householder, thus the Tathāgata, Worthy, Perfectly Enlightened One knows the mind faculty as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa yid kyi dbang po shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /

translated: is the lifespan in the great hell of Burst Blisters.

original: sems can dmyal ba chen po chu bur rdol gyi tshe'i tshad nyi shu gang yin pa de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po so tham tham gyi tshe'i tshad gcig yin no //🔽sems can dmyal ba chen po so tham tham gyi tshe'i tshad nyi shu gang yin pa de ni kyi hud zer gyi tshe'i tshad gcig go /
