translated: What is the life-span in the great Saṃjīva hell? Twenty intermediate eons.

original: kyi hud zer gyi nyi shu gang yin pa de ni aa chu zer gyi gcig go /
analyzed: kyi hud zer gyi nyi shu gang yin pa de ni aa chu zer gyi gcig go /
translated: What is the life-span in the great hell of Saṃghāta? Twenty intermediate eons.

original: aa ra de'i nyi shu gang yin pa de ni me tog dri zhim ltar gas pa'i gcig go /🔽me tog dri zhim ltar gas pa'i nyi shu gang yin pa de ni me tog dri ngad 'jam ltar gas pa'i gcig go /🔽me tog dri ngad 'jam ltar gas pa'i nyi shu gang yin pa de ni aud pa la ltar gas pa'i gcig go /
analyzed: aa ra de'i nyi shu gang yin pa de ni me tog dri zhim ltar gas pa'i gcig go / me tog dri zhim ltar gas pa'i nyi shu gang yin pa de ni me tog dri ngad 'jam ltar gas pa'i gcig go / me tog dri ngad 'jam ltar gas pa'i nyi shu gang yin pa de ni aud pa la ltar gas pa'i gcig go /
translated: What is the life-span in the great hell of Raurava? Twenty intermediate eons.🔽What is the life-span in the great hell of Mahāraurava? Twenty intermediate eons.🔽What is the life-span in the great hell of Tapana? Twenty intermediate eons.

original: aud pa la ltar gas pa'i nyi shu gang yin pa de ni ku mu da ltar gas pa'i gcig go /
analyzed: aud pa la ltar gas pa'i nyi shu gang yin pa de ni ku mu da ltar gas pa'i gcig go /
translated: What is the life-span in the great hell of Pratāpana? Twenty intermediate eons.🔽What is the life-span in the great hell of Avīci? Eighty intermediate eons.

original: ku mud da ltar gas pa'i nyi shu gang yin pa de ni padma dkar po ltar gas pa'i gcig go /
analyzed: ku mud da ltar gas pa'i nyi shu gang yin pa de ni padma dkar po ltar gas pa'i gcig go /
translated: Twenty of these make up one day in the great hell Splitting Like a Lotus.

original: padma dkar po ltar gas pa'i nyi shu gang yin pa de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po padma ltar gas pa'i tshe'i tshad gcig yin no //
analyzed: padma dkar po ltar gas pa'i nyi shu gang yin pa de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po padma ltar gas pa'i tshe'i tshad gcig yin no //
translated: Twenty of these make up one day in the great hell Splitting Like a Lotus.

original: khyim bdag de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni tshe'i dbang po shes pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni tshe'i dbang po shes pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Householder, this knowledge, seeing, clarity, realization, thorough understanding, and expertise is called the knowledge of the life faculty.🔽The Tathāgata fully knows it as it really is.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen @117b to; ;de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i dbang po shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen @117b to; ;de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i dbang po shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If one were to ask the Tathāgata about this knowledge of the life faculty, the Tathāgata would answer.

original: de ni tsandan gyi khyams dang khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni tsandan gyi khyams dang khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: khyim bdag ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas tshe'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: khyim bdag ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas tshe'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who has understood the knowledge of the life faculty, understand as it really is the knowledge of the arising of the life faculty?

original: khyim bdag 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, in this case, the Tathāgata knows thus:🔽‘Having planted wholesome roots with immeasurable lord buddhas, the knowledge of the life faculty is accomplished. ’🔽“Furthermore, householder, the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas tshe'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas tshe'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: ‘The causes and conditions by which the knowledge of the arising of the life faculty is accomplished are just as they really are. ’

original: khyim bdag gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Furthermore, householder, the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis tshe'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis tshe'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: ‘The causes and conditions by which the knowledge of the arising of the life faculty is accomplished are just as they really are. ’

original: gal te mi rtag bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa nas gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te mi rtag bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa nas gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata has understood as it really is the one who, abiding in the contemplation of impermanence, up to the one who abides in the contemplation of the enemy.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes @118a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes @118a *//
translated: “The Tathāgata, having known the arising of the knowledge of the life-faculty,

original: pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus ba na bskal bar lan gsung ba nas de ni /
analyzed: pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus ba na bskal bar lan gsung ba nas de ni /
translated: if asked about that, would give an answer for an eon, up to

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod bar 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod bar 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: he will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and the mansion.🔽“Householder, how does the Tathāgata, having known the cessation of the life-faculty with knowledge,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas tshe'i dbang po shes pas 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas tshe'i dbang po shes pas 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: know cessation as it really is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Here, householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
translated: having done what is to be done for countless beings, having turned away what is not to be done,

original: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
analyzed: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
translated: He has dispelled the darkness and liberated countless beings from suffering, establishing them in happiness.

original: tshe'i dbang po shes pa 'gog pa ste; de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: tshe'i dbang po shes pa 'gog pa ste; de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
translated: “The knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the life force is the cessation of the knowledge of the life force, which is essentially unborn from the beginning.

original: 'di ni / tshe'i dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ni / tshe'i dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya ste /
translated: “This is called the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the life force.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata fully understands it as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
translated: If someone were to ask the Tathāgata about the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the life force, he could answer for an eon or more.

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, how is it

original: de bzhin gshegs pas tshe'i dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur @118b ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas tshe'i dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur @118b ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “How does the Tathāgata know the path the cessation of the knowledge of the life faculty as it really is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis tshe'i dbang po shes pa yongs su shes /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis tshe'i dbang po shes pa yongs su shes /
translated: Householder, here the Tathāgata knows as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the life faculty through the knowledge by which he fully knows,

original: khong du chud /
analyzed: khong du chud /
translated: comprehends,

original: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: and actualizes the knowledge of the life faculty.

original: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If he abides observing the subsequent [state] without relishing,

original: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: if he abides observing the subsequent [state] as a fault,

original: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: or if he abides observing the subsequent [state] as an escape, the Tathāgata knows that as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal bar lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal bar lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: When asked about the knowledge of the path that stops the knowledge of the lord of life, the Tathagata would answer for an eon, and so on.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and the mansion.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathagata

original: de bzhin gshegs pas bde ba'i dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas bde ba'i dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: know the faculty of pleasure just as it is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi bde ba'i tshor ba'am /🔽tshor ba'i rnam pa bde ba gang cung zad yod pa yang dag par yongs su spyad pa'am /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi bde ba'i tshor ba'am / tshor ba'i rnam pa bde ba gang cung zad yod pa yang dag par yongs su spyad pa'am /
translated: Householder, in this case, the Tathagata knows that any bodily pleasant feeling🔽or any pleasant feeling that is a feeling

original: mi mthun par yongs su spyad pa'am /
analyzed: mi mthun par yongs su spyad pa'am /
translated: is either fully enjoyed or not fully enjoyed,

original: spyod lam pa'am /🔽dus tshigs kyis yongs su bsgyur ba 'di ni bde ba'i dbang po @119a *//
analyzed: spyod lam pa'am / dus tshigs kyis yongs su bsgyur ba 'di ni bde ba'i dbang po @119a *//
translated: is either a feeling of conduct🔽or a feeling of time.🔽This is called

original: shes ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: shes ba zhes bya'o //
translated: the knowledge of the faculty of pleasure.

original: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin 'di ni /
analyzed: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin 'di ni /
translated: “The knowledge, seeing, clarity, realization, thorough understanding, and expertise regarding that are

original: bde ba'i dbang po shes pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: bde ba'i dbang po shes pa zhes bya ste /

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /

original: de bzhin gshegs pas dran pa'i dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas dran pa'i dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathāgata know the knowledge of the faculty of mindfulness just as it is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par brjod pa'i mtshan nyid ni /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par brjod pa'i mtshan nyid ni /
translated: Householder, in this regard, the Tathāgata knows the defining characteristic of verbal expression as follows:🔽‘Mindfulness is the faculty of mindfulness.’

original: dran pa'o // zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //🔽dran pa so so nye bar gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: dran pa'o // zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to // dran pa so so nye bar gzhag pa ni /
translated: He knows the establishment of mindfulness as follows:

original: dran pa'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: dran pa'i dbang po'o //
translated: ‘The faculty of mindfulness is the establishment of mindfulness.’

original: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //🔽thams cad du 'gro ba ni /
analyzed: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to // thams cad du 'gro ba ni /
translated: He knows the all-pervading as follows:

original: dran pa'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: dran pa'i dbang po'o //
translated: ‘The faculty of mindfulness is all-pervading.’

original: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Thus, he knows the way things are just as they are.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i dbang po shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i dbang po shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If someone were to ask the Thus-Gone One a question about the knowledge of the faculty of mindfulness, he could answer for an eon, or even longer than an eon.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and this fine mansion.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas dran pa'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin @124a *//🔽rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas dran pa'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin @124a *// rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how does the Thus-Gone One know the knowledge of the arising of the faculty of mindfulness just as it is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis dran pa'i dbang po skye ba'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis dran pa'i dbang po skye ba'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, in this regard, the Thus-Gone One knows just as it is the causes and conditions that give rise to the faculty of mindfulness.

original: gal te stong gyi mtha' rjes su dran pa'am /
analyzed: gal te stong gyi mtha' rjes su dran pa'am /

original: gal te phyi ma'i mtha' las brtsams pa'am /
analyzed: gal te phyi ma'i mtha' las brtsams pa'am /
translated: or if it is the beginning of the future,

original: gal te da ltar byung ba'i dus las brtsams pa'am /
analyzed: gal te da ltar byung ba'i dus las brtsams pa'am /
translated: whether it is in terms of the present,

original: gal te lus la dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: gal te lus la dmigs pa'am /
translated: whether it is in terms of the body,

original: gal te tshor ba la dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: gal te tshor ba la dmigs pa'am /
translated: whether it is in terms of feeling,

original: gal te sems la dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: gal te sems la dmigs pa'am /
translated: whether it is in terms of thought,

original: gal te chos la dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: gal te chos la dmigs pa'am /

analyzed: gal te 'dod pa la dmigs pa'am / gal te gnod sems la dmigs pa'am /
translated: whether it is in terms of desire,🔽whether it is in terms of malice,

analyzed: gal te rnam par 'tshe ba la dmigs pa'am /

original: gal te nges par 'byung ba la dmigs pa'am /🔽gal te gnod sems med pa la dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: gal te nges par 'byung ba la dmigs pa'am / gal te gnod sems med pa la dmigs pa'am /

original: gal te rnam par mi 'tshe ba la dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: gal te rnam par mi 'tshe ba la dmigs pa'am /
translated: whether it is in terms of non-violence,🔽whether it is in terms of the Buddha,

original: gal te sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'am; gal te chos la dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: gal te sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'am; gal te chos la dmigs pa'am /
translated: whether it is in terms of the Dharma,

original: gal te dge 'dun la dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun la dmigs pa'am /
translated: whether it is in terms of the Saṅgha,

original: tshul khrims la dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: tshul khrims la dmigs pa'am /
translated: whether it is in terms of morality,

original: ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa'am /
translated: whether it is in terms of concentration,

original: shes rab la dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: shes rab la dmigs pa'am /

original: rnam par grol ba la dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba la dmigs pa'am /

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la dmigs pa'am /
translated: whether it is in terms of the vision of the wisdom of liberation,

original: gal te zad pa la dmigs @124b pa'am; gal te mi skye ba la dmigs pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa de lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te zad pa la dmigs @124b pa'am; gal te mi skye ba la dmigs pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa de lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: If it is the observation of cessation or the observation of non-arising, the Tathāgata knows it as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If one were to ask the Tathāgata about this, he would answer in the same way.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and the mansion.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas dran pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas dran pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how is it that the Tathāgata knows as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the faculty of mindfulness?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis dran pa'i dbang po skyes pa'i rgyu de dag 'gog pa las dran pa'i dbang po 'gog ste /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis dran pa'i dbang po skyes pa'i rgyu de dag 'gog pa las dran pa'i dbang po 'gog ste /
translated: Householder, in this case, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the cessation of the faculty of mindfulness that arises from the causes and conditions of the faculty of mindfulness.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: That the Tathāgata knows as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de la'ang zhes bya ba nas longs spyod pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de la'ang zhes bya ba nas longs spyod pa'i bar du 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who is thus gone, know the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the faculty of mindfulness?

original: de bzhin gshegs pas dran pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /🔽khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas dran pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na / khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, here the Tathāgata has knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the faculty of mindfulness.

original: shes pa gang gis dran pa'i dbang po shes pa yongs su shes /🔽khong du chud /🔽mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: shes pa gang gis dran pa'i dbang po shes pa yongs su shes / khong du chud / mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: He knows as it really is: ‘Through the cessation of this knowledge, the knowledge of the faculty of mindfulness ceases and is not produced.’

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i dbang @125a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i dbang @125a *//
translated: “The Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One, the one who has perfect knowledge and action, the Supreme One, the one who knows the world, the charioteer who tames people, the Teacher of gods and humans, the Buddha, the Bhagavat knows the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the faculty of mindfulness.🔽“If one were to ask why, it is because he has the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the faculty of mindfulness.

original: po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: “If someone were to ask, ‘What is the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the faculty of mindfulness?’🔽“If someone were to ask, ‘What is the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the faculty of mindfulness?’🔽“If someone were to ask, ‘What is the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the faculty of mindfulness?’

original: de ni; tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni; tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He will enjoy this place, from the sandalwood walkway up to the kūṭāgāra.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who is thus gone, know the faculty of samādhi as it really is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te; gal te bsam gtan dang po'am /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te; gal te bsam gtan dang po'am /
translated: “Householder, here the Tathāgata knows as it really is the one-pointedness of mind, whether it is the first concentration,

original: gal te bsam gtan gnyis pa'am /
analyzed: gal te bsam gtan gnyis pa'am /
translated: the second concentration,

original: gal te bsam gtan gsum pa'am /
analyzed: gal te bsam gtan gsum pa'am /
translated: the third concentration,

original: gal te bsam gtan bzhi pa'am /🔽gal te byams pa'am /
analyzed: gal te bsam gtan bzhi pa'am / gal te byams pa'am /
translated: the fourth concentration,🔽whether it is love,

original: gal te snying rje 'am /
analyzed: gal te snying rje 'am /
translated: whether it is compassion,

original: gal te dga' pa'am /
analyzed: gal te dga' pa'am /
translated: whether it is joy,

original: gal te btang snyoms sam /
analyzed: gal te btang snyoms sam /
translated: whether it is equanimity,

original: gal te nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa'am /
analyzed: gal te nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa'am /
translated: whether it is the sphere of infinite space,

original: gal te 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar ram /
analyzed: gal te 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar ram /
translated: up to whether it is the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: gal te rnam par thar pa'am /
analyzed: gal te rnam par thar pa'am /
translated: If it is a liberation,

original: gal te zad par gyi skye mched dam /🔽gal te zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched de dag gis ji ltar sems rtse gcig par mngon du gyur pa de /
analyzed: gal te zad par gyi skye mched dam / gal te zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched de dag gis ji ltar sems rtse gcig par mngon du gyur pa de /
translated: if it is a sphere of totality,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji @125b lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji @125b lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: if it is a sphere of mastery, then the Tathāgata knows just as it is the way that mind becomes one-pointed.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sems rtse gcig pa de dag la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas longs spyod pa'i bar du 'gyur ro; ;khyim bdag /🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sems rtse gcig pa de dag la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas longs spyod pa'i bar du 'gyur ro; ;khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: The Tathāgata, when asked about those one-pointed minds, would answer for an eon and more.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathāgata know the knowledge of the arising of the power of concentration just as it is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis sems rtse gcig tu 'gyur ba /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis sems rtse gcig tu 'gyur ba /
translated: Householder, in this case, the Tathāgata knows just as it is the cause and the condition by which the mind becomes one-pointed.

original: gal te mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes kyis sam /
analyzed: gal te mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes kyis sam /
translated: If it is by the perception of impurity,

original: gal te rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes kyis sam /🔽gal te rnam par rul ba'i 'du shes kyis sam /
analyzed: gal te rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes kyis sam / gal te rnam par rul ba'i 'du shes kyis sam /
translated: “If it is the perception of a swollen corpse,🔽if it is the perception of a rotting corpse,🔽if it is the perception of a corpse being eaten by worms,

original: gal te rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes kyis sam /🔽gal te rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes kyis sam /🔽gal te rus gong gi 'du shes kyis sam /🔽gal te rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes kyis sam /
analyzed: gal te rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes kyis sam / gal te rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes kyis sam / gal te rus gong gi 'du shes kyis sam / gal te rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes kyis sam /
translated: if it is the perception of a burned corpse,🔽if it is the perception of a corpse being eaten by wild animals,🔽if it is the perception of a corpse being scattered,🔽if it is the perception of a corpse without flesh and blood,

original: gal te rnam par mi ldan pa'i 'du shes kyis sam /🔽gal te nges par 'byung ba'i 'du shes kyis sam /🔽gal te gnod sems med pa'i 'du shes kyis sam /
analyzed: gal te rnam par mi ldan pa'i 'du shes kyis sam / gal te nges par 'byung ba'i 'du shes kyis sam / gal te gnod sems med pa'i 'du shes kyis sam /
translated: if it is the perception of a corpse without joints,🔽if it is the perception of non-hatred,

original: gal te rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i 'du shes kyis sam /
analyzed: gal te rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i 'du shes kyis sam /
translated: if it is the perception of non-violence,

original: gal te sems can gyi 'du shes kyis sam /
analyzed: gal te sems can gyi 'du shes kyis sam /
translated: if it is the perception of sentient beings,

original: gal te chos kyi 'du shes kyis te /
analyzed: gal te chos kyi 'du shes kyis te /
translated: if it is the perception of phenomena,🔽the Tathāgata knows it as it truly is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa @126a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa @126a *//
translated: The Tathāgata

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If one were to ask about the knowledge of the faculty of absorption, the answer would be spoken for an eon, and so on, up to

original: longs spyod pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: longs spyod pa'i bar du 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: the enjoyment of the Dharma.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na; khyim bdag /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na; khyim bdag /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, Perfectly Supreme Buddha know the knowledge of the cessation of the faculty of absorption as it really is?

original: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po skye ba'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag 'gog pa las ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po 'gags te /
analyzed: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po skye ba'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag 'gog pa las ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po 'gags te /
translated: Householder, in this regard, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the cessation of the causes and conditions that give rise to the faculty of absorption, and the cessation of the faculty of absorption.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: The Tathāgata knows that as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If one were to ask about the Tathāgata, the answer would be spoken for an eon, and so on, up to

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na; de bzhin gshegs pas ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na; de bzhin gshegs pas ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and the palace.🔽“Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who is endowed with the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the faculty of concentration, know it as it really is?🔽“Householder, here the Tathāgata knows as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the faculty of concentration that is to be known,🔽that is to be fully understood,

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa gang gis ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po shes pa yongs su shes /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa gang gis ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po shes pa yongs su shes /
translated: that is to be directly realized,🔽that is to be made a living experience,

original: khong du chud /
analyzed: khong du chud /
translated: and that is to be realized by oneself.🔽“Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who is endowed with the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the faculty of wisdom, know it as it really is?🔽“Householder, here the Tathāgata knows as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the faculty of wisdom that is to be known,🔽that is to be fully understood,

original: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa @126b ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa @126b ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: that is to be directly realized,

original: longs spyod pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: longs spyod pa'i bar du 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: that is to be made a living experience,🔽and that is to be realized by oneself.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who is endowed with the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the faculty of wisdom, know it as it really is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows this thus:

original: sdug bsngal gyi phung po dpag tu med pa mthar byed pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po dang / 'khor ba dpag tu med pa'i mthar byed pa dang / phung po dag gi rim pa dpag tu med pa'i mthar byed pa dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dpag tu med pa'i mthar byed pa dang /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi phung po dpag tu med pa mthar byed pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po dang / 'khor ba dpag tu med pa'i mthar byed pa dang / phung po dag gi rim pa dpag tu med pa'i mthar byed pa dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dpag tu med pa'i mthar byed pa dang /
translated: “The faculty of wisdom that ends the immeasurable mass of suffering, that ends the immeasurable saṃsāra, that ends the immeasurable stages of the aggregates, that ends the immeasurable encountering of the unpleasant,

original: sdug pa dang bral ba dpag tu med pa'i mthar byed pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa'i mthar byed pa dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa'i mthar byed pa dang / 'du byed pa'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa'i mthar byed pa 'di ni /
analyzed: sdug pa dang bral ba dpag tu med pa'i mthar byed pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa'i mthar byed pa dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa'i mthar byed pa dang / 'du byed pa'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa'i mthar byed pa 'di ni /
translated: that ends the immeasurable separation from the pleasant, that ends the immeasurable suffering of suffering, that ends the immeasurable suffering of change, and that ends the immeasurable suffering of the formative forces

original: shes rab kyi dbang po ste /🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bskyed pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi dbang po ste / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bskyed pa /
translated: is the faculty of wisdom.🔽It gives rise to the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi bskyed pa /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi bskyed pa /
translated: gives rise to the four right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bskyed pa /🔽dbang po lnga bskyed pa /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bskyed pa / dbang po lnga bskyed pa /
translated: It is the development of the four bases of supernatural powers.🔽It is the development of the five faculties.

original: stobs lnga bskyed pa /
analyzed: stobs lnga bskyed pa /
translated: It is the development of the five powers.

original: rjes su dran pa drug bskyed pa /
analyzed: rjes su dran pa drug bskyed pa /
translated: It is the development of the six recollections.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bskyed pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bskyed pa /
translated: It is the development of the seven parts of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bskyed pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bskyed pa /
translated: It is the development of the eightfold noble path.

original: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong @127a *//
analyzed: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong @127a *//
translated: It is the development of tranquility and insight.

original: bskyed pa / rig pa bskyed pa /
analyzed: bskyed pa / rig pa bskyed pa /
translated: It is the development of knowledge.

original: rnam par grol ba bskyed pa /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba bskyed pa /
translated: It is the development of liberation.

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba bskyed pa /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba bskyed pa /
translated: It is the development of the vision of the wisdom of liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i mchog /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i mchog /
translated: It is the supreme gate of liberation.

original: sgrib pa med pa'i mig /
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa'i mig /
translated: It is the unobstructed eye.

original: 'khor ba'i skyon yang dag par ston pa /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i skyon yang dag par ston pa /
translated: It is the perfect teaching of the faults of saṃsāra.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan shin tu brjod pa /🔽'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mchog tu bya ba byas pa /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan shin tu brjod pa / 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mchog tu bya ba byas pa /
translated: It is the perfect expression of the qualities of nirvāṇa.🔽It is the supreme activity of the tathāgatas of the past.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang mchog tu byed par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang mchog tu byed par 'gyur ba /
translated: It is the supreme activity of the tathāgatas of the future.

original: da ltar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing gzhes pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi dbang po 'di mchog tu mdzad pa /
analyzed: da ltar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing gzhes pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi dbang po 'di mchog tu mdzad pa /
translated: The blessed buddhas who are present in the innumerable world systems of the present also consider this faculty of wisdom to be supreme.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa'am /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa'am /
translated: Whether it is the vehicle of the hearers,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am /
translated: the vehicle of the solitary buddhas,

original: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi shes rab kyi dbang po'i thog ma ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi shes rab kyi dbang po'i thog ma ste /
translated: or the unsurpassed wisdom of the buddhas, the faculty of wisdom is the beginning of all of them.

original: khyim bdag / de ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de ltar na /
translated: Householder, in this way

original: de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te / de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: the Thus-Gone One has thoroughly understood the knowledge of the faculty of wisdom.🔽If one were to ask the Thus-Gone One about this knowledge of the faculty of wisdom, he would answer for an eon, or even longer than an eon.

original: longs spyod pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: longs spyod pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, he would continue to explain it in detail.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, in this way🔽the Thus-Gone One has thoroughly understood the knowledge of the faculty of wisdom.🔽If one were to ask the Thus-Gone One about this knowledge of the faculty of wisdom, he would answer for an eon, or even longer than an eon.🔽In this way, he would continue to explain it in detail.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas shes @127b rab kyi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas shes @127b rab kyi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “How does the Tathāgata know the knowledge of the arising of the faculty of wisdom as it really is?”

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, here the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa gal te mi rtag pa'i rnam pas sam /
analyzed: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa gal te mi rtag pa'i rnam pas sam /
translated: ‘If the faculty of wisdom arises through a cause and through conditions, then if it is through the aspect of impermanence,

original: de bzhin du sbyar te phyir rgol ba'i rnam pas sam; gal te mun pa'i rnam pas sam /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te phyir rgol ba'i rnam pas sam; gal te mun pa'i rnam pas sam /
translated: or similarly, if it is through the aspect of an adversary, or if it is through the aspect of darkness,

original: gal te mi rtag pa dang rjes su 'brel pa'i rnam pas sam /
analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa dang rjes su 'brel pa'i rnam pas sam /
translated: or if it is through the aspect of being connected with impermanence,

original: gal te dbus su spyod pas sam /🔽gal te mdza' ba'i rnam pas sam /
analyzed: gal te dbus su spyod pas sam / gal te mdza' ba'i rnam pas sam /
translated: or if it is through the aspect of conduct in the middle,🔽or if it is through the aspect of a friend,

original: gal te mi mdza' ba la mdza' bshes lta bu'i rnam pas sam /
analyzed: gal te mi mdza' ba la mdza' bshes lta bu'i rnam pas sam /
translated: or if it is through the aspect of a friend toward an enemy,

original: gal te skyon du lta ba'i rnam pas sam /
analyzed: gal te skyon du lta ba'i rnam pas sam /
translated: or if it is through the aspect of a fault,

original: gal te sgyid lug pa'i rnam pas sam /
analyzed: gal te sgyid lug pa'i rnam pas sam /
translated: or if it is through the aspect of laziness,

original: gal te yid brtan du mi rung ba'i rnam pas sam /
analyzed: gal te yid brtan du mi rung ba'i rnam pas sam /
translated: or if it is through the aspect of unreliability,

original: gal te chu'i srin po'i rnam pas te /
analyzed: gal te chu'i srin po'i rnam pas te /
translated: If it were in the form of water spirits,

original: rnam pa de lta bu dpag tu med pa 'bum de dag gis shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu dpag tu med pa 'bum de dag gis shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: in that way, with countless hundreds of thousands of such forms, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the faculty of wisdom.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na /
translated: And if there were questions about the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the faculty of wisdom,

original: bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: he would answer them for eons, and so on as before.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na @128a *//
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na @128a *//
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood terrace and palace.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathāgata know as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the faculty of wisdom?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, here the Tathāgata has this kind of knowledge:

original: shes rab kyi dbang po ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi dbang po ni /
translated: The faculty of wisdom

original: bskyed pa'i chos can yin la /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i chos can yin la /
translated: is a phenomenon that is produced.

original: bskyed pa'i chos can gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i chos can gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The one who has the quality of arising

original: 'gog pa'i chos can te /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i chos can te /
translated: has the quality of cessation.

original: shes rab de'ang sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don gyi phyir skyes shing sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas nas 'gags /
analyzed: shes rab de'ang sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don gyi phyir skyes shing sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas nas 'gags /
translated: That wisdom arises for the sake of countless sentient beings and ceases after accomplishing the welfare of countless sentient beings.

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don ma yin pa bzlog nas 'gags /🔽sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par mdzad nas 'gags /
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don ma yin pa bzlog nas 'gags / sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par mdzad nas 'gags /
translated: It ceases after turning away from what is not the welfare of countless sentient beings.🔽It ceases after liberating countless sentient beings from suffering.

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams bde ba la btsud nas 'gags te /
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams bde ba la btsud nas 'gags te /
translated: It ceases after establishing countless sentient beings in happiness.

original: shes rab kyi dbang po rjes su dran pa na'ang sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: shes rab kyi dbang po rjes su dran pa na'ang sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byed par 'gyur /
translated: When recalling the faculty of wisdom, it will accomplish the welfare of countless sentient beings.

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don ma yin pa bzlog par 'gyur zhing 'gags /
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don ma yin pa bzlog par 'gyur zhing 'gags /
translated: It will turn away from what is not the welfare of countless sentient beings and cease.

original: shes rab kyi dbang po rjes su dran pa na'ang sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: shes rab kyi dbang po rjes su dran pa na'ang sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byed par 'gyur /
translated: When they recollect the faculty of wisdom, they think, ‘I will liberate countless beings from suffering.

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams bde ba la btsud par 'gyur zhing 'gags /
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams bde ba la btsud par 'gyur zhing 'gags /
translated: I will bring countless beings to happiness.’

original: @128b shes rab kyi dbang po rjes su dran pa na'ang sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi mun pa sel bar 'gyur /
analyzed: @128b shes rab kyi dbang po rjes su dran pa na'ang sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi mun pa sel bar 'gyur /
translated: When they recollect the faculty of wisdom, they think, ‘I will dispel the darkness of countless beings.

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi snang bar 'gyur zhing 'gags /
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi snang bar 'gyur zhing 'gags /
translated: I will be the light for countless beings.’

original: shes rab kyi dbang po rjes su dran pa na'ang lam gol ba 'gog par 'gyur zhing lam 'byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi dbang po rjes su dran pa na'ang lam gol ba 'gog par 'gyur zhing lam 'byed par 'gyur te /
translated: When they recollect the faculty of wisdom, they think, ‘I will block the wrong paths and open the right path.’

original: 'di ni / shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the faculty of wisdom.

original: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya ste /
translated: The knowledge, seeing, clarity, realization, full understanding, and expertise that is in regard to the cessation of the knowledge of the faculty of wisdom is called the knowledge of the cessation of the faculty of wisdom.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: The Tathāgata has fully known the knowledge of the cessation of the faculty of wisdom just as it is.

original: khyim bdag / de ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de ltar na /
translated: Householder, in this way

original: de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: the Tathāgata has fully known the knowledge of the cessation of the faculty of wisdom just as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: When asked about the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the faculty of wisdom, he would answer for an eon and so on as before.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and the mansion.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, in what way

original: de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin @129a *//🔽rab tu mkhyen ce na /🔽khyim bdag // 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas shes pa gang gis shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa yongs su shes; khong du chud /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin @129a *// rab tu mkhyen ce na / khyim bdag // 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas shes pa gang gis shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa yongs su shes; khong du chud /
translated: “How does the Tathāgata know the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the faculty of wisdom as it really is?

original: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, here the Tathāgata knows with knowledge the cessation of the knowledge of the faculty of wisdom as it really is.

original: gal te mngon par shes pa'i shes pas sam; gal te yongs su shes pa'i shes pas sam /
analyzed: gal te mngon par shes pa'i shes pas sam; gal te yongs su shes pa'i shes pas sam /
translated: If it is the knowledge of supernormal power, or the knowledge of complete understanding,

original: gal te spong ba'i shes pas sam /
analyzed: gal te spong ba'i shes pas sam /
translated: or the knowledge of abandonment,

original: gal te sgom pa'i shes pas sam /
analyzed: gal te sgom pa'i shes pas sam /
translated: or the knowledge of cultivation,

original: gal te mngon sum du byas pa'i shes pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te mngon sum du byas pa'i shes pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: or the knowledge of realization, the Tathāgata knows that knowledge as it really is.

original: shes pa gang gis shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa yongs su shes /
analyzed: shes pa gang gis shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa yongs su shes /
translated: With what knowledge does he know the knowledge of the faculty of wisdom as it really is?

original: khong du chud /
analyzed: khong du chud /
translated: He understands it,

original: mngon sum du byas nas 'gog pa shes pa de nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung zhing bskal pa brgya'am /
analyzed: mngon sum du byas nas 'gog pa shes pa de nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to // de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung zhing bskal pa brgya'am /
translated: Having realized it, he knows the cessation of the knowledge of cessation, which is not shared in common with any of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.🔽“Householder, if someone were to ask you, ‘Householder, when will you be seated on the lion throne in the sandalwood pavilion, and teach the Dharma to the fourfold assembly?’

original: bskal pa stong ngam /🔽bskal pa bye ba'am /🔽bskal pa phrag 'bum mam /🔽bskal pa khrag khrig gam /🔽bskal pa gtams sam /
analyzed: bskal pa stong ngam / bskal pa bye ba'am / bskal pa phrag 'bum mam / bskal pa khrag khrig gam / bskal pa gtams sam /
translated: what would you reply to them?”

original: @129b bskal pa dkrigs sam /🔽bskal pa khyad phyin nam /🔽bskal pa dpag tu med par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /🔽de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @129b bskal pa dkrigs sam / bskal pa khyad phyin nam / bskal pa dpag tu med par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te / de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: “Noble one, if someone were to ask me that, I would reply, ‘After a hundred eons, or a thousand eons, or a hundred thousand eons, or a million eons, or a billion eons, or a trillion eons, or a quintillion eons, or an incalculable, immeasurable, vast, infinite, fathomless, incomparable, equal to the unequaled, inconceivable, immeasurable, limitless, and inexpressible number of eons, I will be seated on the lion throne in the sandalwood pavilion, and teach the Dharma to the fourfold assembly.’

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: “Householder, how will you be seated on the lion throne in the sandalwood pavilion, and teach the Dharma to the fourfold assembly?”

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “How does the Tathāgata know the faculty of understanding what has not been understood as it really is?”

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas gnas shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas gnas shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
translated: “Householder, here the Tathāgata knows as it really is the understanding of what has not been understood in the knowledge of the known.🔽He knows as it really is the understanding of what has not been understood in the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the known.

original: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen; gnas shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
analyzed: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen; gnas shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is the understanding of what has not been understood in the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the known.🔽He knows as it really is the understanding of what has not been understood in the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the known.

original: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen /
analyzed: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen /
translated: He knows as it really is the understanding of what has not been understood in the knowledge of the known.🔽He knows as it really is the understanding of what has not been understood in the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the known.

original: gnas shes pa 'gog pa shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //🔽zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen /
analyzed: gnas shes pa 'gog pa shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so // zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen /
translated: He knows as it really is the understanding of what has not been understood in the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the known.

original: gnas shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //🔽zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gnas shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so // zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: He knows as it really is the understanding of what has not been understood in the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the known.

original: gnas pa ma yin pa shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
analyzed: gnas pa ma yin pa shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is the understanding of what has not been understood in the knowledge of the known.

original: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen /
analyzed: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen /
translated: Thus he knows the past in accordance with reality.🔽“He knows the future in accordance with reality.🔽He knows the future arising of knowledge in accordance with reality.

original: gnas ma yin pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
analyzed: gnas ma yin pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
translated: He knows the future cessation of knowledge in accordance with reality.🔽He knows the future path leading to the cessation of knowledge in accordance with reality.

original: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen /🔽@130a *// gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
analyzed: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen / @130a *// gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
translated: Thus he knows the future in accordance with reality.

original: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen /
analyzed: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen /
translated: “He knows the present in accordance with reality.🔽He knows the present arising of knowledge in accordance with reality.🔽He knows the present cessation of knowledge in accordance with reality.

original: gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
analyzed: gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
translated: He knows the present path leading to the cessation of knowledge in accordance with reality.

original: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Thus he knows the present in accordance with reality.🔽“He knows the past in accordance with reality.

original: 'das pa shes te; 'das pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /🔽'das pa shes pa 'gog pa shes /
analyzed: 'das pa shes te; 'das pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes / 'das pa shes pa 'gog pa shes /
translated: He knows the past arising of knowledge in accordance with reality.🔽He knows the past cessation of knowledge in accordance with reality.

original: 'das pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
analyzed: 'das pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
translated: He knows the past path leading to the cessation of knowledge in accordance with reality.

original: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Thus he knows the past in accordance with reality.

original: ma 'ongs pa shes pa la mi shes dag kun shes so //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa shes pa la mi shes dag kun shes so //
translated: “With regard to knowledge of the future, they know what is not known.

original: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /🔽ma 'ongs pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
analyzed: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te / ma 'ongs pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
translated: They know it just as it is.🔽They know the arising of knowledge of the future.

original: ma 'ongs pa shes pa 'gog pa shes /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa shes pa 'gog pa shes /
translated: They know the cessation of knowledge of the future.

original: ma 'ongs pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa dag kun shes so //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa dag kun shes so //
translated: They know the path that leads to the cessation of knowledge of the future.

original: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: They know it just as it is.

original: da ltar byung ba la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
translated: “With regard to knowledge of the present, they know what is not known.

original: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /🔽da ltar byung ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
analyzed: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te / da ltar byung ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
translated: They know it just as it is.🔽They know the arising of knowledge of the present.

original: da ltar byung ba shes pa 'gog pa shes /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba shes pa 'gog pa shes /
translated: They know the cessation of knowledge of the present.

original: da ltar byung ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa @130b kun shes so //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa @130b kun shes so //
translated: They know the path that leads to the cessation of knowledge of the present.

original: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: They know it just as it is.

original: las shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
analyzed: las shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
translated: “With regard to knowledge of karma, they know what is not known.

original: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Thus he knows perfectly just as it is.🔽He knows perfectly just as it is: “I know perfectly the knowledge of karma, the knowledge of the arising of karma, the knowledge of the cessation of karma, and the knowledge of the path to the cessation of karma.”🔽He knows perfectly just as it is: “I know perfectly the knowledge of karma, the knowledge of the arising of karma, the knowledge of the cessation of karma, and the knowledge of the path to the cessation of karma.”

original: las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa la mi shes pa dag dang / las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa la mi shes pa dag dang / las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
analyzed: las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa la mi shes pa dag dang / las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa la mi shes pa dag dang / las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
translated: He knows perfectly just as it is: “I know perfectly the knowledge of right adoption, the knowledge of the arising of right adoption, the knowledge of the cessation of right adoption, and the knowledge of the path to the cessation of right adoption.”

original: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //🔽yang dag par blang ba shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //🔽zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /🔽yang dag par blang ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /🔽yang dag par blang ba shes pa 'gog pa shes /
analyzed: zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to // yang dag par blang ba shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so // zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te / yang dag par blang ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes / yang dag par blang ba shes pa 'gog pa shes /
translated: Thus he knows perfectly just as it is.🔽He knows perfectly just as it is: “I know perfectly the knowledge of right adoption, the knowledge of the arising of right adoption, the knowledge of the cessation of right adoption, and the knowledge of the path to the cessation of right adoption.”🔽He knows perfectly just as it is: “I know perfectly the knowledge of right adoption, the knowledge of the arising of right adoption, the knowledge of the cessation of right adoption, and the knowledge of the path to the cessation of right adoption.”

original: yang dag par blang ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa kun shes so //🔽zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //🔽gnas dang gnas kyi shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //
analyzed: yang dag par blang ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa kun shes so //🔽zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //🔽gnas dang gnas kyi shes pa la mi shes pa dag kun shes so //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas kun shes pa'i dbang po shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the faculty of complete knowing just as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun shes pa'i dbang po shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun shes pa'i dbang po shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
translated: If one were to ask the Tathāgata about this faculty of complete knowing, he would answer for an eon, or even longer than that.

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, how does
